name: Devil's Lair (Kaiipu)
description:
DEVIL'S LAIR:

This is my entry for the Mini Jam 50!

Simple 2D Shooter made in Unity, your only objective is to protect your island from the evil ghosts. How much time can you survive?

If you find any bugs (very likely since this was very rushed), please don't hesitate to contact me on Twitter @KaiipuDev

Didn't have time to add SoundFX and Particles, still need to improve my time management :)

Hope you guys enjoy this small creation <3
